General.Name: Shanghai STEP Electric Corp
General.Description: Shanghai STEP Electric Corporation manufactures and sells electric and motion control products in China and internationally. The company offers industrial robots, variable frequency and servo drives, intelligent manufacturing, and service robots. Its products and solutions are used in 3C electronics, lithium, semiconductor, photovoltaic, logistics, food and beverage, medical, automotive, dispensing, laser, machine tool, elevator, pump, HVAC, rubber and plastic, general energy saving, engineering machinery, metal products, chemical products, home furniture, and other industries. Shanghai STEP Electric Corporation was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

4.Name: Ms. Li Sha  Yang
4.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
